original_title: Risk of food shortage if Maha season is a failure
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Minister of Agriculture Mahinda Amaraweera said there is a risk of food shortage arising if the upcoming Maha season is not a success.
Speaking at an event held in Agunukolapelessa, the Agriculture Minister said there is a risk of the Maha season being a failure due to drought.
The minister requested the people to take measures to understand the situation and grow any food crop in every place that can be used for plantations.
